**Date & time:** Monday, June 5, 2023

**Instructor**: Jessica Guo

In this workshop you'll gain a better understanding of the "grammar of graphics"---the theory underlying the `ggplot2` package.
Using practical examples, you'll learn how understanding the grammar of graphics can help you build more creative, complex, information-rich visualizations.
